WorkItem.Description:
Hi All,
 
I am using .NET 2.0 and trying to export highcharts using Clément Agarini module. And using svg.dll.
But SvgDocument.Open(streamSvg) method always returns null.
Please help to rectify the issue
Thanks in advance..

Comments.Message:
Have a look at my issue here: http://svg.codeplex.com/workitem/17961

If you are using the .dll in the download section, try getting the source and compiling it yourself.
